name: 謝國恩
objective:
先修課程：負責教授同意。力系的平衡、摩擦、面積與質量慣性矩、結構分析、虛功法。
Equivalent System of Forces, Static Equilibrium, Friction, Structure Analysis, Area and Mass Moment of Inertia, Method of Virtual Work
schedule:
週次	講授內容概要	教科書章節
1	General Principles	Ch.1
2	Force Vectors	Ch.2
3	Equilibrium of a Particles	Ch.3
4	Equilibrium of a Particles	Ch.3
5	Force System Resultants	Ch.4
6     	Force System Resultants	Ch.4
7	Equilibrium of a Rigid Body	Ch.5
8	Equilibrium of a Rigid Body	Ch.5
9	Midterm Exam.	
10	Structural Analysis 	Ch.6
11	Structural Analysis	Ch.6
12	Internal Forces	Ch.7
13	Friction	Ch.8
14	Center of Gravity, Centroid	Ch.9
15	Moments of Inertia	Ch.10
16	Moments of Inertia, Virtual Work	Ch.10, Ch.11 
17	Virtual Work	Ch.11
18	Final
scorePolicy: 作業與隨堂測驗佔30%，期中考佔30%，期末考佔40%
materials: R. C. Hibbeler 〝 Engineering Mechanics STATICS 〞11th Edition in SI units
